vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the American Association of Retired Persons (AARP) for the Community Challenge Grant Award in the amount of $20,000.00 for costs associated with pedestrian and vehicle safety enhancements at the intersection of Elam Road and North Jim Miller Road; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the AARP Elam Road Pedestrian Safety Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the AARP Elam Road Pedestrian Safety Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement, and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $20,000.00 - Financing: American Association of Retired Persons Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the American Association of Retired Persons (AARP) for the Community Challenge Grant Award in the amount of $20,000.00 for costs associated with pedestrian and vehicle safety enhancements at the intersection of Elam Road and North Jim Miller Road; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the AARP Elam Road Pedestrian Safety Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the AARP Elam Road Pedestrian Safety Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement, and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $20,000.00 - Financing: American Association of Retired Persons Grant Funds
